Contact us at Reiki Light

At Reiki Light, we're here to support you on your healing journey. Whether you're seeking Reiki healing, energy healing, or holistic healing services, our experienced practitioners in Salt Lake City are here to help you tap into the transformative power of Reiki.

We also offer comprehensive Reiki training programs, empowering you to become a certified Reiki practitioner and share the healing benefits of Reiki with others.

If you have any questions about our services, or if you're ready to book your appointment or sign up for our training program, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to hearing from you and supporting you on your path to optimal health and well-being.
